titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to impose the social security earnings test on the retirement annuities of Members of Congress.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2420-2421)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 3/7/1994--Introduced. Amends the Civil Service and Federal Employees' Retirement Systems to subject the retirement annuities of Members of Congress to reduction in social security benefits on account of outside income under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.
